page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: In the village of Tilshead there is a garage which has four petrol pumps.The village is on Salisbury plain.In Tilshead there is a school it is quite old.At the bottom of the school lane there is a village hall which is also old.The shop doubles as a post office. The houses in the small village are thatched others are new houses.The church is old we always do our services there. The people who own the garage also run a breakdown service. There are tea-rooms. There is a recreation field where we do our sports. There is a pub.You can rent cars and caravans from the garage there is a camping site where people come and camp in Tilshead. There is a pipe factory in the village one of the boys at school dad works there.In our village the army are heard all around us.
